page.title: 05Ettingshall Park Farm Estate
page.content: Our estate is very busy. It is bounded by Wolverhampton Rd. East and Birmingham New Rd. and has Dovedale Rd. crossing through it. Mostly houses and shops,there are two Primary Schools,Spring Vale and Hill Avenue. The estate also has a recreation space and a piece of waste land that children call the Canyon. The Canyon is an old opencast clay and coal pit very near to the site of the Ettingshall Park farm now demolished. It has become a rubbish tip and there are lots of motorbike riders using it. Some people have organised a petition in favour of turning the Canyon into a motor biking club track. Parts of the estate are untidy but in others it is neat. There are some large and well cared for gardens. Most of the gardens are well looked after and pretty. The houses are about sixteen to twenty years old.
